text: The Medicine Hat Tigers are a Canadian professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1970. They currently play in the Western Hockey League. They play their home games in Medicine Hat, Alberta at the Medicine Hat Arena. The Tigers have won two national Memorial Cups, five WHL League Championships and seven Division Titles. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1970 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Western Hockey League Category:Ice hockey teams in Alberta
title: Medicine Hat Tigers
